pullrequest.title: A whole new world all over again (server side)

content.raw:
Ok, I addressed those. Removed the sleeps of many seconds and substituted by checks to see if things are actually clean.

I also manually opened every world which ships with Gazebo. They all seem to be cleaned up and open properly except for those which have the PR2, which actually crash Gazebo when trying to open from a message (they still open normally from startup though). I'll look into this later.

`INTEGRATION_world_open` passes properly except for `OpenWorldMsg`, which has a left over `/gazebo/default/request` topic, I still don't know where that's coming from.
content.html:
Ok, I addressed those. Removed the sleeps of many seconds and substituted by checks to see if things are actually clean.

I also manually opened every world which ships with Gazebo. They all seem to be cleaned up and open properly except for those which have the PR2, which actually crash Gazebo when trying to open from a message (they still open normally from startup though). I'll look into this later.

INTEGRATION_world_open passes properly except for OpenWorldMsg, which has a left over /gazebo/default/request topic, I still don't know where that's coming from.
